# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is SNAKE.
<ROUND i="1 of 10">
<ROUND_INFO> 20 coins start in the shared pot. Choose how many coins to take for yourself (your contribution is what remains). Valid choice: integer from 0 to 20. The pot multiplier is 2.1×. </ROUND_INFO>
<CONTRIB> 0 </CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="0" multiplied_contrib="0.0" active_players="4" redistributed_each="0.0"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> MOOSE=0,GORILLA=0,WALRUS=0 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<MECHANISM_INFO> It will cost you, per unit, 1 coins to give a reward of 1.0 coins. Choose whom to reward and by how many units. </MECHANISM_INFO>
<REWARD> {} </REWARD>
